_comment: Main configuration for the Cylae Video File Checker script. This file allows you to customize the script's behavior without editing the code.

performance._comment: Settings for performance tuning. Adjust these based on your computer's power.
performance._maxConcurrentJobs_comment: Number of files to process at once. A good starting point is the number of your CPU cores minus one. Example: 4.
performance._enableDuplicateDetection_comment: Set to true to find duplicate files. WARNING: This will significantly slow down the scan as it has to read every byte of every file.

ffmpeg._comment: Settings for FFmpeg. The {filePath} placeholder is required and will be replaced with the actual file path.
ffmpeg._gpu_examples_comment: Below are examples for using GPU acceleration. Copy the desired command into the 'command' field above.

sevenZip._comment: Download URL for the portable version of 7-Zip, used for extracting FFmpeg.

fileHandler._comment: Settings for how to find and handle files.
fileHandler._actionOnCorruption_comment: What to do with corrupted files. Supported: 'Move' or 'Delete'. 'Move' is safer.
fileHandler._quarantinePath_comment: The folder where corrupted videos will be moved if actionOnCorruption is 'Move'.

hashing._comment: Settings for the duplicate file detection algorithm.
hashing._algorithm_comment: The algorithm to use for hashing. Can be SHA256, SHA1, MD5, etc. SHA256 is recommended.
